::Shadow Wing::

She flew down and through some of the glaicar  canyons.  It was a blue 
crystal wonderland.  She felt at home with the ice.  She figured this was 
where she belonged. On ice.  She flew past some caves and past another 
mountain.  She found a small cave.  She flew tothe entrance and transformed 
into bot mode.  She walked around inside.  Surprizingly, it was warmer in 
the cave.  She walked to one of the back caverns and found a small 
hotspring.  This would keep her warm when she slept.  She looked around.  
there was a small hole in the ceiling that acted as a vent foe the steam 
from the hotspring.  She thought her luck was turning about.  She could hunt 
the small animals that ran around outside.  And stiil stay warm when she 
slept.  She smiled at her good fortune. "Oh, this cave would be the most 
perfect spot for..." she stopped.  She almost said Lunarpine.  "No, maybe 
not.  If I'm here, then it wouldn't do for a warrior like him. No, not at 
all." She turned and looked up.  She found a small ledge in which she could 
rest on.  She transformed into beast mode and flew up to the ledge.  She 
fell sleep with fitfull dreams.
